data.question: What is the empirical formula of [Cu4I4(dmimpr)2]n?
What is the yield percentage for the synthesis of [Cu6I6(dimb)3]n?
At what temperature were the crystal structures of 1 and 2 determined?
What is the space group of [Cu4I4(dmimpr)2]n?
What type of luminescence shift is observed for [Cu4I4(dmimpr)2]n when cooled from 298K to 77K?
What is the correlation between the luminescence thermochromism and the structural parameters in [Cu4I4(dmimpr)2]n and [Cu6I6(dimb)3]n?
data.answer: The emission red shifts caused by cooling are related to compression of the Cu···Cu distances.

data.question: Is the luminescence thermochromism of [Cu4I4(dmimpr)2]n and [Cu6I6(dimb)3]n reversible?
Does the luminescence thermochromism in [Cu4I4(dmimpr)2]n and [Cu6I6(dimb)3]n involve a chemical process involving phase transition?
What is the crystal system of [Cu6I6(dimb)3]n?
What is the shortest Cu···Cu contact distance observed in [Cu6I6(dimb)3]n?
What is the function of the dmimpr ligand in the structure of [Cu4I4(dmimpr)2]n?
data.answer: It extends cubic Cu4I4 clusters to form a 2D layer.

data.question: What is the luminescent quantum yield of [Cu4I4(dmimpr)2]n at room temperature?
Is the emission spectrum of [Cu4I4(dmimpr)2]n at 77K split into two bands?
What is the relationship between the maximum emission wavelength and temperature for [Cu4I4(dmimpr)2]n?
Are the luminescence thermochromism phenomena in [Cu4I4(dmimpr)2]n and [Cu6I6(dimb)3]n caused by temperature-dependent Cu···Cu distances?
What is the red shift of the emission peak for [Cu6I6(dimb)3]n when cooled from 298K to 77K?
Does the structure of [Cu6I6(dimb)3]n include both cubane-type Cu4I4 and rhomboid-type Cu2I2 clusters?
What is the role of the dimb ligand in the structure of [Cu6I6(dimb)3]n?
data.answer: It connects Cu4I4 cubic clusters and Cu2I2 rhombic clusters to form a 2D sheet.

data.question: Is the luminescence thermochromism of [Cu4I4(dmimpr)2]n and [Cu6I6(dimb)3]n caused by a change in the relative intensities of two emission bands?
What is the significance of the luminescence color changes in [Cu4I4(dmimpr)2]n and [Cu6I6(dimb)3]n upon temperature variation?
data.answer: They are promising for sensor applications.
